name: Candy Conflict
description:
Beta test in progress!

Candy Conflict is a mix of board, puzzle and strategic game. 

- Collect new candies

- Collect ultimate power-ups

- Fight Your enemies

- Try different strategies

- Pass a lot of interesting levels

- Be the greatest soldier in sweet army
